description: A person wearing headphones plays a racing video game on a monitor, steering through curves and passing another car on a digital racetrack.
The car in the game accelerates down the racetrack, shifting gears and passing a red competitor on the left.
The car in the game approaches a corner, slows down, and turns right while the player steers using a controller.
The car accelerates out of the turn and proceeds down a straight section of the racetrack.
A man sits at a desk playing a racing video game on a monitor using a game controller, with earphones in.
